newsitem.title: UK: Rank buys Tom Cobleigh for 95.6mln stg.
newsitem.headline: Rank buys Tom Cobleigh for 95.6mln stg.

text.p: The Rank Organisation Plc said it had made a recommended offer for pub chain Tom Cobleigh Plc at 240 pence per share, valuing the company at around 95.6 million stg.
In a statement, Rank said it had irrevocable undertakings to accept the offer for 61.5 percent of the company from directors and their family trusts.
Rank said the deal was expected to have a neutral impact on earnings per share in the first full financial year and to be earnings enhancing thereafter.
